data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Narsingdi a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, help every believer in Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,787 believers in Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kasar (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kasar (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kasar (Hindu traditions) people is yours.
Father, remind your church in Narsingdi that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Narsingdi access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the county of Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh has a population of 2,224,900.

We estimate Narsingdi has 2,787 people who might know Jesus, 6,675 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,215,438 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Narsingdi, Dhaka, Bangladesh to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Narsingdi
location.people_groups_list: Jaraj (Muslim traditions), Karadar, Kapali, Jat Atra, Khairwar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jaraj (Muslim traditions) (19,000), Karadar (2,400), Kapali (205,000), Jat Atra (4,000), Khairwar (500)
